personal.name: Jishnu Prasad
personal.title: DevOps Engineer & Site Reliability Expert
personal.tagline: Scaling infrastructure, automating everything, and ensuring reliability at enterprise scale. Passionate about cloud-native technologies and building resilient systems that power the future.

about.title: About Jishnu
description: With over 7+ years of experience in DevOps, Cloud Infrastructure, and Site Reliability Engineering, I specialize in building and maintaining scalable, reliable systems that power modern applications.

My expertise spans across cloud platforms, container orchestration, infrastructure automation, and implementing robust monitoring and alerting systems. I'm passionate about creating efficient CI/CD pipelines and fostering a culture of reliability and continuous improvement.

expertise.title: Cloud(AWS)
expertise.desc: Expertise in designing and implementing scalable architectures on AWS

jobs.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
jobs.description: Leading the SRE team to enhance system reliability, automate infrastructure management, and implement best practices for applications architecture. Focused on performance optimization and incident response.

jobs.title: Cloud Support Engineer | EC2 Linux SME
jobs.description: Provided expert-level support for various AWS services, resolving complex issues, optimizing performance, and enhancing customer satisfaction through proactive solutions.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Implemented CI/CD pipelines, containerized applications, and optimizing Microservices architectures.

jobs.title: Linux System Administrator
jobs.description: Managed Linux servers, automated routine tasks, and ensured system security and performance. Developed scripts for system monitoring and maintenance. Implemented CI/CD pipelines for application deployments.

items.title: Automated CI/CD Framework
items.description: Engineered an efficient CI/CD framework using Jenkins alongside BitBucket Pipelines and GitHub Workflows.
items.impact: Reduced deployment time by 50% and improved code integration rates by over one third

items.title: Automated EC2 Instance Patching
items.description: Automated EC2 instance patching using Patch Manager and Boto3.
items.impact: Enhanced security posture and compliance with industry standards. Reduced manual effort by 60%

items.title: Kubernetes Microservices Deployment
items.description: Deployed FastAPI microservices on Kubernetes, utilizing rolling updates and Horizontal Pod Autoscaler (HPA) to achieve reduction in downtime.
items.impact: Achieved a 60% reduction in downtime and a 90% reduction in deployment time

items.title: Cross-Platform DB Backup & Restore GUI App
items.description: Developed a cross-platform DB backup and restore GUI app using Tkinter (Python), which helped end users easily take backups and restore their databases when required.
items.impact: Simplified database management for end users, reducing support requests by 40%

items.title: Customized Ubuntu ISO Creation
items.description: Created customized Ubuntu ISOs for end users using Cubic (Custom Ubuntu ISO Creator), pre-installed with necessary applications and configurations.
items.impact: Streamlined system setup for new users, reducing setup time by 60% and improving user experience

items.title: Jenkins Job Management Bot
items.description: Created a Telegram bot for managing Jenkins jobs, allowing engineers to remotely trigger and monitor job status directly from their smartphones.
items.impact: Improved team productivity by enabling remote job management, reducing the need for constant desktop access

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.description: I'm always interested in discussing new opportunities, innovative projects, or just chatting about the latest in DevOps and cloud technologies. Let's build something amazing together!
